keybind.fovfixtoggle: 切換視野廣度修正設置
message.charging_base: 幫實體身上穿戴的物品充電
item.numina.battery_basic.desc: 基礎電池可與其他物品整合，使物品能儲存能量。
item.numina.battery_advanced.desc: 高階電池可與其他物品整合，使物品能儲存更多能量。
item.numina.battery_elite.desc: 精良電池可與其他物品整合，使物品能儲存大量能量。
item.numina.battery_ultimate.desc: 實驗性的高端能量儲存裝置，但已非常穩定，幾乎不可能爆炸（我們認為）。儘管外頭有些流言蜚語，但我們還是得再次聲稱：這絕對不是剽竊外星科技而來的。
tooltip.numina.pressShift: 按住 shift 鍵以取得更多資訊.
tooltip.numina.changeModes: Change modes: Press and hold the number of the hotbar slot the PowerFist is in.
tooltip.numina.noModules: 偵測到未裝載任何模組！這件物品將沒有任何用處，除非使用加工台為它添加一些模組。
item.numina.component_wiring.desc: A special type of wiring with high voltaic capacity and precision, necessary for the sensitive electronics in power armor.
item.numina.component_solenoid.desc: Wires wound around a ferromagnetic core produces a basic electromagnet.
item.numina.component_servo.desc: A special type of motor which uses a pulse-modulated signal to enact very precise movements.
item.numina.component_glider_wing.desc: A lightweight aerodynamic wing with an electromagnet for quick deployment and retraction.
item.numina.component_ion_thruster.desc: Essentially a miniature particle accelerator. Accelerates ions to near-light speed to produce thrust.
item.numina.component_parachute.desc: A simple reusable parachute which can be deployed and recovered in midair.
item.numina.component_field_emitter.desc: An advanced device which directly manipulates electromagnetic and gravitational fields in an area.
item.numina.component_laser_emitter.desc: A multicoloured laser array which can cheaply alter the appearance of something.
item.numina.component_carbon_mMyofiber.d: A small bundle of carbon fibers, refined for use in artificial muscles.
item.numina.component_control_circuit.de: A simple networkable microcontroller for coordinating an individual component.
item.numina.component_myofiber_gel.desc: A thick, conductive paste, perfect for fitting between myofibers in an artificial muscle."
An electrical, artificial muscle, with less range of movement than human muscle but orders of magnitude more strength.
item.numina.component_solar_panel.desc: A light sensitive device that will generate electricity from the sun.
item.numina.component_magnet.desc: A metallic device that generates a magnetic field which pulls items towards the player.
item.numina.component_computer_chip.desc: An upgraded control circuit that contains a CPU which is capable of more advanced calculations.
item.numina.component_rubber_hose.desc: A heavily insulated rubber hose capable of withstanding extreme heat or cold
